verses.verse: Then came <WH7126> <WH8799> the daughters <WH1323> of TZ'lof'chad <WH6765>, the son <WH1121> of Hepher <WH2660>, the son <WH1121> of Gil`ad <WH1568>, the son <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353>, the son <WH1121> of M'nasheh <WH4519>, of the families <WH4940> of M'nasheh <WH4519> the son <WH1121> of Yosef <WH3130>: and these are the names <WH8034> of his daughters <WH1323>; Mahlah <WH4244>, Noach <WH5270>, and Hoglah <WH2295>, and Milcah <WH4435>, and Tirzah <WH8656>.

And they stood <WH5975> <WH8799> before <WH6440> Mosheh <WH4872>, and before <WH6440> Eleazar <WH499> the Kohen <WH3548>, and before <WH6440> the princes <WH5387> and all the congregation <WH5712>, by the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Our father <WH1> died <WH4191> <WH8804> in the wilderness <WH4057>, and he was not in <WH8432> the company <WH5712> of them that gathered themselves together <WH3259> <WH8737> against the YY <WH3068> in the company <WH5712> of Korach <WH7141>; but died <WH4191> <WH8804> in his own sin <WH2399>, and had no sons <WH1121>.

Why should the name <WH8034> of our father <WH1> be done away <WH1639> <WH8735> from among <WH8432> his family <WH4940>, because he hath no son <WH1121>? Give <WH5414> <WH8798> unto us therefore a possession <WH272> among <WH8432> the brethren <WH251> of our father <WH1>.
And Mosheh <WH4872> brought <WH7126> <WH8686> their cause <WH4941> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

The daughters <WH1323> of TZ'lof'chad <WH6765> speak <WH1696> <WH8802> right <WH3651>: thou shalt surely <WH5414> <WH8800> give <WH5414> <WH8799> them a possession <WH272> of an inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> their father's <WH1> brethren <WH251>; and thou shalt cause the inheritance <WH5159> of their father <WH1> to pass <WH5674> <WH8689> unto them.

And thou shalt speak <WH1696> <WH8762> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, If a man <WH376> die <WH4191> <WH8799>, and have no son <WH1121>, then ye shall cause his inheritance <WH5159> to pass <WH5674> <WH8689> unto his daughter <WH1323>.
And if he have no daughter <WH1323>, then ye shall give <WH5414> <WH8804> his inheritance <WH5159> unto his brethren <WH251>.
And if he have no brethren <WH251>, then ye shall give <WH5414> <WH8804> his inheritance <WH5159> unto his father's <WH1> brethren <WH251>.

And if his father <WH1> have no brethren <WH251>, then ye shall give <WH5414> <WH8804> his inheritance <WH5159> unto his kinsman <WH7607> that is next <WH7138> to him of his family <WH4940>, and he shall possess <WH3423> <WH8804> it: and it shall be unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> a statute <WH2708> of judgment <WH4941>, as the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> Mosheh <WH4872>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Get thee up <WH5927> <WH8798> into this mount <WH2022> Abarim <WH5682>, and see <WH7200> <WH8798> the land <WH776> which I have given <WH5414> <WH8804> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And when thou hast seen <WH7200> <WH8804> it, thou also shalt be gathered <WH622> <WH8738> unto thy people <WH5971>, as Aharon <WH175> thy brother <WH251> was gathered <WH622> <WH8738>.

For ye rebelled <WH4784> <WH8804> against my Mitzvah <WH6310> in the desert <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790>, in the strife <WH4808> of the congregation <WH5712>, to sanctify <WH6942> <WH8687> me at the water <WH4325> before their eyes <WH5869>: that is the water <WH4325> of Meribah <WH4809> in Kadesh <WH6946> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790>.
And Mosheh <WH4872> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto the YY <WH3068>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
Let the YY <WH3068>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of the spirits <WH7307> of all flesh <WH1320>, set <WH6485> <WH8799> a man <WH376> over the congregation <WH5712>,

Which may go out <WH3318> <WH8799> before <WH6440> them, and which may go in <WH935> <WH8799> before <WH6440> them, and which may lead them out <WH3318> <WH8686>, and which may bring them in <WH935> <WH8686>; that the congregation <WH5712> of the YY <WH3068> be not as sheep <WH6629> which have no shepherd <WH7462> <WH8802>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Take <WH3947> <WH8798> thee Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, a man <WH376> in whom is the spirit <WH7307>, and lay <WH5564> <WH8804> thine hand <WH3027> upon him;
And set <WH5975> <WH8689> him before <WH6440> Eleazar <WH499> the Kohen <WH3548>, and before <WH6440> all the congregation <WH5712>; and give him a charge <WH6680> <WH8765> in their sight <WH5869>.
And thou shalt put <WH5414> <WH8804> some of thine honour <WH1935> upon him, that all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> may be `Ovedient <WH8085> <WH8799>.

And he shall stand <WH5975> <WH8799> before <WH6440> Eleazar <WH499> the Kohen <WH3548>, who shall ask <WH7592> <WH8804> counsel for him after the judgment <WH4941> of Urim <WH224> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>: at his word <WH6310> shall they go out <WH3318> <WH8799>, and at his word <WH6310> they shall come in <WH935> <WH8799>, both he, and all the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> with him, even all the congregation <WH5712>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> did <WH6213> <WH8799> as the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> him: and he took <WH3947> <WH8799> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, and set <WH5975> <WH8686> him before <WH6440> Eleazar <WH499> the Kohen <WH3548>, and before <WH6440> all the congregation <WH5712>:
And he laid <WH5564> <WH8799> his hands <WH3027> upon him, and gave him a charge <WH6680> <WH8762>, as the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH1696> <WH8765> by the hand <WH3027> of Mosheh <WH4872>.
